review: My IPad, IPhone, and other devices get a strong enough signal from my cisco wifi router, this Fire TV Stick is unable to receive a powerful enough signal.  I am going to try to change my wifi router to see if that works.  However, I feel that I should not have to do so, as my many other wifi devices all connect quite well.  Even my Roku connects well and gives us a seamless viewing experience.  So, unfortunately, either this device is defective, or the radio in the device has a poorly designed antenna.
author: Amazon Customer "healthplans"

review: Not as easy to use as the Roku. Fire Stick needs a separate power connection to work, the Roku doesn't. The Roku immediately located my wireless network, the Fire Stick didn't find it and when directed to it, it wouldn't connect. Played with the Fire Stick for 45 minutes and boxed it back up to ship back to Amazon.
